summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an individual to appear before a grand jury on July 24, 2019, to testify and produce documents related to alleged violations of federal sex trafficking and conspiracy statutes. The document includes an attached 'Advice of Rights' and a cover letter requesting confidentiality.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, signing the document and the accompanying cover letter requesting confidentiality.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance
events.description: The subpoena commands an individual to appear before a federal grand jury at the U.S. Courthouse in Foley Square, New York, to testify and give evidence.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The grand jury subpoena is dated and issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office, initiating the formal command for testimony and document production.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The subpoena is issued in connection with an investigation into alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 1591 (sex trafficking), 2421, 2422, 2423 (transportation for prostitution, coercion, and child sexual exploitation), and 371 (conspiracy).
The recipient is commanded to appear on July 24, 2019, at 10:00 a.m., and to produce unspecified items, with failure to comply constituting contempt of court.
The U.S. Attorney's Office requests the recipient voluntarily refrain from disclosing the existence of the subpoena to any third party to preserve the confidentiality of the investigation.
The document includes an 'Advice of Rights' informing the recipient of their right against self-incrimination and right to counsel.
